headline.main: SICILY'S AIR BASES SEVERELY POUNDED; Only Milo of Four Bombed Sends Heavy Flak and Enemy Fighters Are Few

lead_paragraph: ALLIED HEADQUARTERS IN NORTH AFRICA, July 1 -- American air power dealt another punishing blow to Sicily yesterday when formidable forces of heavy and medium bombers escorted by fighters blasted and scourged the port of Palermo and four key airfields where the aerial defense of the island rests.
